tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Artificial Teeth,Dental X-Ray,Bleeding Gums Treatment,Ceramic Crowns and Bridges Fixing,Periodontal Flap Surgery,
review:
We first got introduced as patients --alongwith -----continued also as  friendship bondage---- for more than 27 years  .We always feel secured under his care and treatment.We regard Dr  Chelliah Venkatraman as one of our family members --more than a doctor.  It can be said that he has created a space among the  masses to feel protected under a dentist for dental problems and to   wipe out  the general  opinion that a dentist  will always be known for extraction or replacement of tooth.He treats patients with total care and the most important thing is his positive approach which greatly helps the patients.In this regard We ,all our family members 
 feel very happy and lucky too!! It is needless to say he is very friendly and very efficient doctor who treats patients with patience full care ,and service mindedness.Though he is the Chief of the hospital he is always approachable which indicates the positivity between the patients and the doctors.Doctor Venkatraman is having a wonderful efficient team of doctors with him.We do recommend and suggest that for any dental problem people can approach PARASU for the best solution with remedy.We wish the DRVenkatraman to achieve many more and more success in the field .ThankYou somuch doctor and wishing PARASU all hte best to achieve still more success!!!
------------------P GANESAN &LALITHAG

*** **** *** the most friendly dentist I have ever seen  Dr. Chellia Venketraman. He diagnosed the problem and found a quick solution without any injection.I got my braces on Feb,19 and by Dec,19 my treatment was completed. Appointments were on time and follow ups were perfect . I personally love his way of saying Thank u after each sittings . I feared a lot for a dental treatment but I was immensely happy after my treatment with Dr.Chellia ..I would always suggest Parasu dental for anything related to teethüòÅ.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Extremely Friendly,  he was so humble and he gave me time to overcome anxiety during the tooth extraction,  so kind never met a Doctor with this patience.  i really wanted to thank him so much for his patience and being kind with me! also he gave me a shot with Mint chocolate flavor which happened to be my favorite flavor. i wanted to thank him for that too.

The doctor was friendly and made an effort to make me feel comfortable, however the following consultations and treatments was done by junior doctors/consultants without supervision. Less than 3 months post root canal  I had to visit the clinic again due to pain for the last couple of days. I was not satisfied with the consultation and advices given by the junior consulting doctor today. Whenever we asked for the consultations the senior doctor was always on travel according to the clinic. The follow up treatment  should have been better handled.

The chief doctor was very courtiers and patient. I understood that he spends at least 15 minutes just to understand his patient and only then he begins the procedure every time.  NO WONDER HE IS ON DEMAND. Yet surprisingly he talks to his clients very gently though the clinic is busy.  Thank you parasu for the great treatment.

Dr.Chelliah the chief and the prosthodontist  Dr.Manoj are great. I m walking out of the clinic as a satisfied client. I'd love to introduce parasu dental hospitals to my colleagues. 

Thanks to the customer relations making my entire process simple and neat.

Thanks a lot

Dr. Chelliah is an excellent doctor. He took time to do every procedure. He is professional and have done treatments without pain. Will suggest my friends for any dental treatments. Excellent service from start to end.

Good , through examination done, calcium cleaning done thoroughly ,cavity 
problem identify, and filled with expertise.

review: Dr chelliah experienced n efficient doctor.. Im fully satisfied aftr visiting him.. Im fully confident tat my treatmnt s under the **** doctorüòÄüòÄüëçüèª

Actually doctor is good but he is not saying anything about costing and how much it would take. Also he is speaking more technically to his assistants were we have to wonder what they are speaking about. Other than that he is good.
A polite person, takes care and address your issue. Experience speaks with him. One can trust him cent percent.
Friendly and approachable . Doctor treated with care. All my dental problems are sorted out. Neat and clean infrastructure.
We feel good and satisfied treatment was good and my daughter feel no pain , they gave good advice,we will recomed to our friends
Need to ensure staff knows the pricing.There was a big deviation from initial estimate I was told. Other than that service is good. Doctor explains procedure and is patient enough
Great attention and I was made to feel good at all times. Very good experience. Personalised service from all. Great doctors and best wishes!

I came to this hospital. Its so nice as they did all my procedures very well.thank you to Dr.chelliah and team.

I have one more sitting I am happy to choose the right doctor for my dental implants.

I came for scaling and filling. Dr.chelliah is my family dentist for more than 10 years now. 

We always would like to come for dental treatment a with him.
